Room.Name: Dark Squall
Room.ShortDescription: The Vallenda Pass is to the west, if you can get past the bad weather.
Room.LongDescription: Although you cannot see your direction indicator, the wind provides you with a steady from the east. Weather is a funny thing - down here the winds push you westard, but if you fly higher, the winds are blowing from west to east. Mordor is a strange land indeed.
